alert.note: Alert for Escambia Coastal; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 6:19PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN SANTA ROSA AND CENTRAL ESCAMBIA COUNTIES THROUGH 600 PM CDT... At 518 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pace, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ferry Pass, Ensley, Gonzalez, Pace, Milton, Bagdad, Pea Ridge, and Floridatown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Escambia Coastal; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland
